name: osm-tags-wiki-vs-osmdata-miner
description: The tool extracts first occurences of currently [documented](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Map_Features) OSM tags (using [taghistory's API](https://github.com/tyrasd/taghistory#api)) and merges that with the creation dates of the corresponding pages on the OSM wiki.
author: Martin Raifer <martin@raifer.tech>
